## ArgumentMetadata interface

The public interface outlining the metadata for a [Command](./jambo.command.md)<!-- -->'s argument. This includes the type of the argument's values, if it is required, and an optional default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ArgumentMetadata<T extends ArgumentType> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultValue?](./jambo.argumentmetadata.defaultvalue.md) | T | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional, a default value for the argument. |
|  [description](./jambo.argumentmetadata.description.md) | string | The description of the argument. |
|  [isRequired?](./jambo.argumentmetadata.isrequired.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> A boolean indicating if the argument is required. |
